name: mysql-connection-pool-manager
description: This is a mySQL Connection Pool Manager wrapper powered by mysqljs/mysql and allows for intelligent management & load balancing mysql connection pools.

scripts.deploy-patch: git commit -a -m 'module update: patch' && git push && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.deploy-minor: git commit -a -m 'module update: minor' && git push && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.deploy-major: git commit -a -m 'module update: major' && git push && npm version major && npm publish

author: David Makuni
